expo.name: todo-app
expo.description:
Hi there! Here is a fast app I did this afternoon for the things we use to forgot. Yes, you got it. A To Do app.

With this app you can add Todo's in a simple and intuitive way and delete them once you finished the task ;)

Any doubt or question you might have don't doubt to reach me at: 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/cristian-manzano/


and also Have a nice day! :)
